meanings.definition: Jours: plural of jour, meaning days.
meanings.sent1: She counted the jours until her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The sunny jours of summer always make her smile.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten chased after the colorful jours of the week.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with vibrant colors, each representing different jours.
meanings.sent5: The busy market was bustling with people, each carrying bags filled with various jours.

meanings.definition: Jours: used in the phrase 'tous les jours' meaning every day.
meanings.sent1: He goes jogging tous les jours to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She practices the piano tous les jours to improve her skills.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel steals nuts tous les jours from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticks tous les jours, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The diligent student studies tous les jours to ace the exam.
